name: Skye Revival (Pre - Alpha Version)(InDev 0.0.1)
description:
Play as Vega, a young rookie Police Officer in the city of Skye trying to solve a missing case. Dash, Slash, and Attack enemies in your path and get to the goal in this 2D Action-Packed Platformer - Hack-N-Slash hybrid.

The people at Komic Software Studios want to combine the best in gaming to make Skye Revival. There were many inspirations when making the game, Skye Revival will be avaliable on PC, Mac, and Linux TBA 2020, right now the game is in very early progress, we want to work hard to make Skye Revival a 2D Action Platformer like no other, a brand new unique experience.

  • Developer: Komic Software Studios
  • Music: TeeSoar Productions

If you are interested in the project, consider supporting us by following the game or joining any one of the links below!

  • -Skye Revival Official Twitter
  • -Discord Server
  • - Youtube Channel
